about_the_game:
911 FR - 3D action opening the world of the sunniest city on the Pacific coast. Try being a law enforcement officer, rush to help in an ambulance, or respond to reports of a tree cat.

In creating the game, we build on the concept of the virtual version of Los Angeles, but all the names of geographical points, streets and house numbers have been replaced and replaced. All the matches with real objects - random.



Gaming features:

  • large gaming card;
  • 20+ accessible special-purpose vehicles;
  • 50+ random events;
  • 3 main departments - PD, EMS, FD:
  • plot-questing system;
  • much more...

Errors and problems

The game is Early Access and can have different bugs, errors and problems. If you encounter one, please report to the Community Centre. There you can present your ideas and suggestions for the development of the game.


911FR - our first game. Valuable and extensive experience in creating a game world. And we have big plans for the development of 911FR, creating new game worlds on the subject of emergency services.
detailed_description:
I HAVE BUG! WHAT TO DO?

If you found a bug or error (for example with UI, localization or map's textures), please take a screenshot of this error and go to our Community Center to create a topic in this unique category.

If you're in our Community Center for the first time, you can login through your Steam account. Authorization is fully secure and protected by an Essential SSL certificate.

name: 911 FR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Two and more physical cores 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card that supports OpenGL 3.0 1024 VRAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card that supports OpenGL 3.0 1024 VRAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Protect law enforcement, provide medical aid and rescue from the clutches of fire! Police, EMS, Fire - choose your Department and go to the streets to do their duty!
